thread.title: Amazon: Newisland Magnetic Building Blocks 36 Piece Set Only $17 Shipped
thread.title_full: Amazon: Newisland Magnetic Building Blocks 36 Piece Set Only $17 Shipped

author: Bryn (Sister Sidekick)
title: Amazon: Newisland Magnetic Building Blocks 36 Piece Set Only $17 Shipped
text:
Encourage creativity, brain development & critical thinking! Through February 25th, head over to Amazon.com to grab this Newisland Magnetic Building Blocks 36 Piece Set with green container bag for just $17.03 with free shipping (regularly $23.99) after promo code MAGNETIE at checkout.
This 36-piece set of magnetic pieces includes a combination of triangles and squares and comes with a double zippered bag, instruction booklet and even includes a 12-month warranty. Plus, it ships for free from within the United States and will arrive within 3-7 days.
